## FaceImage class

Face image data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FaceImage 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fromCanvas(canvas, quality)](./core.faceimage.fromcanvas.md) | <code>static</code> | Extracts face image from a browser's canvas object. |
|  [fromDataURL(image)](./core.faceimage.fromdataurl.md) | <code>static</code> | Extracts face image from a data URL. Only <code>data:image/jpeg;base64</code> is supported for now. |
|  [toBioSample(format, purpose, sdkVersion)](./core.faceimage.tobiosample.md) |  | Exports the face image data to a [BioSample](./core.biosample.md) object. |
